title: Cozy Ground Floor Studio Available for Immediate Move-in
posting_body: ['Avalon Silicon Valley offers thoughtfully designed studios, one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment homes in the heart of Silicon Valley.', 'Our contemporary Sunnyvale apartments offer a variety of finish packages including stainless steel appliances, quartz countertops, backsplash and hard surface flooring in kitchens and baths.', 'And now with our Furnished+ program, apartment living is easier than ever before.', 'Appreciate the stylish furnishings and enjoy the convenience of pre-installed Wi-Fi and cable TV, flexible lease-terms, and utilities that are included in your rent.', 'With Furnished+, you can step right into the life you want live, without all the hassle.', 'Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living.', 'Take advantage of community amenities including heated swimming pools complete with therapeutic spas and sun decks, a state of the art fitness center with yoga room, beautifully landscaped grounds with barbecue and picnic areas, and underground parking.', 'Our 24-hour maintenance team will ensure that all your needs and service requests are met, leaving you to enjoy every minute of your stay at our Sunnyvale apartment community.', ' Live up at Avalon Silicon Valley.', 'Rent: $2835', 'Bedrooms: 0', 'Bathrooms: 1', 'Apartment Features:', 'Washer/ Dryer', '1st Floor', 'Furnished Available*', 'Community Amenities:', 'Barbecue', 'Parking', 'Highway Access', 'Package Acceptance', 'Pool', 'Playground', 'Pet Friendly', 'Call us!', 'show contact info', 'To learn more about this unit, visit us at <URL>', 'Prices and availability are subject to change.']
